smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function generateWaypoints is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'SteerableBody' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'GameplayClassicModeScreen' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class GameplayClassicModeScreen is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function renderGameScene appears to be too complex.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: Gdx.app.applicationListener cannot be safely cast to Game.

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

codeX can be a `const val`.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'com.sheepsgohome.leaderboard.LeaderBoardRow' is unused.
The import 'com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body' is unused.
The import 'com.sheepsgohome.gdx.listeners.clicked' is unused.
The import 'com.sheepsgohome.shared.GameData' is unused.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (CAMERA_WIDTH / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: CAMERA_WIDTH / 2
Parentheses in (columnSize / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: columnSize / 2
Parentheses in (-columnSize * row) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: -columnSize * row
Parentheses in (CAMERA_HEIGHT / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: CAMERA_HEIGHT / 2

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class LeaderBoardRow defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class LeaderBoardResult defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Private property randomFloat is unused.
Private property i is unused.
Private property fpsLogger is unused.
Private property debugRenderer is unused.
Function parameter arg is unused.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of GameData.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of SteerableBody.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of OkDialog.

smells.description: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: com.sheepsgohome.enums.GameResult.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.sheepsgohome.enums.GameState.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.sheepsgohome.gameobjects.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.sheepsgohome.enums.GameResult.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: OptionalWhenBraces
smells.description: Optional braces in when expression

instances.message: Optional braces in when expression
Optional braces in when expression

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
